full_summary:
# Tender Solicitation Notice

## Tender Title (English) / Titre de l'appel d'offres (français)
Solvent Purification System / Système de purification des solvants

## Reference Number / Numéro de référence
WS4257876624-Doc4257914672

Expired / Expiré

## Tender Closing Date / Date de clôture de l'appel d'offres

2023-11-30

2025-03-31

WS4257876624

## Contact Information / Informations de contact
Keenan, Matthew
matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Description / Description de l'appel d'offres
CanmetENERGY Devon (CE-D) seeks a supplier for the delivery of a Solvent Purification System capable of purifying 7 different solvents. The system will be used to purify laboratory solvents for the synthesis of advanced materials for hydrogen storage, purification, and carbon-dioxide capture and conversion. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-11-17 14:00 EST.
